## Summit Job Timings


```{r trimmomatic-timings}

ntasks = c(1,2,4,8,16,16)
elapsed = c(10.5,3.75,4,3.5,(3*60+48)/60,(3*60+24)/60)
df = data.frame(ntasks, elapsed)
df %>% ggplot(aes(x=ntasks,y=elapsed)) + geom_line()  + geom_point() + ggtitle("Trimmomatic elapsed time versus ntasks")
```
